translation.en: NETFLIX PRESENTS
[Laura] You shouldn't be here.
translation.fr: Tu ne devrais pas être ici.

translation.en: -♪ No one is perfect enough ♪ -[Laura] I don't have panties.
translation.fr: Je ne porte pas de culotte.

translation.en: [in Polish] I couldn't find anything decent.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien trouvé de décent.

translation.en: New house, new wardrobe, but it's still the same old mess.
[screams, in English] What the hell are you doing here?
You're sick people. You know that?
[in Polish] You deviants! Freaks! Filthy perverts!
[in English] Massimo, you have to get out of here! It brings bad luck to see the bride before the wedding.
translation.fr: Massimo, sors d'ici ! Ça porte malheurde voir la mariée avant le mariage,

translation.en: Not to say to bang her and ruin her makeup!
translation.fr: sans parler de la baiseret d'abîmer son maquillage.

translation.en: [in Polish] You're driving me crazy. You'd give Grandma Krysia a heart attack.
translation.fr: Tu me rends folle.Tu filerais une attaque à mamie Krysia.

translation.en: -[in English] Are you jealous? -Listen to me.
Please have some respect for Polish tradition, okay?
translation.fr: Un peu de respectpour la tradition polonaise, d'accord ?

translation.en: If you want, next time you can join us.
translation.fr: La prochaine fois, joins-toi à nous.

translation.en: Go, go, go!
[in Polish] Or whatever you people say.
[in English] See you later, alligator!
[in Polish] It was supposed to be perfect. The wedding, the dress, and you.
translation.fr: C'était censé être magnifique.Le mariage, la robe, toi. Et moi ?

translation.en: And I was supposed to be relaxing.
Just look at you. [scoffs]
I'm not gonna get on your ass about it, but you never smoke.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas t'emmerder,mais tu n'as jamais fumé.

translation.en: Whatever. If you wanna pretend to be a badass, fine.
[Olga] But I need to know something.
translation.fr: Mais je dois savoir une chose.

translation.en: You haven't told him, have you?
translation.fr: Tu ne lui as pas dit, hein ?

translation.en: Okay. None of my business.
You've been trying to tell him, though, right?
translation.fr: Tu as essayé de lui dire, non ?

translation.en: I think about it every day.
Massimo can never know I was pregnant.
translation.fr: Massimo ne peut pas savoirque j'étais enceinte.

translation.en: [Olga] That's great.
A dark secret is the foundation of any successful relationship.
translation.fr: Un sombre secret est la basede tout couple solide.

translation.en: [Laura] What should I do?
Tell him I lost the baby in the tunnel where I almost died?
translation.fr: Lui dire qu'il a perdu son enfantdans un tunnel où j'ai failli mourir ?

translation.en: Do you know what he'd do?
What?
[Laura] These people aren't normal.
translation.fr: Ce ne sont pas des gens normaux.

translation.en: A war would break out.
[scoffs] A war? Come on.
You know Massimo.
He never lets things go.
Know what a "vendetta" is?
You do realize we're in Sicily, right?
I mean, I've heard the word before.
In movies. Who hasn't? Of course I know what it means.
translation.fr: Au cinéma, comme tout le monde.

translation.en: Oh shit.
I wasn't thinking.
It was the hardest decision of my life.
translation.fr: Ça a été la plus dure décision de ma vie.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You're the strongest woman I've ever met. You know that?
translation.fr: Tu es la femme la plus forteque je connaisse.

translation.en: Remember, you're not alone. I'm here for you.
translation.fr: Souviens-toi, tu n'es pas seule.Je suis là.

translation.en: So, do you love him?
Okay, let's go.
Help me get ready. I promise I won't forget my panties this time.
translation.fr: Viens m'arranger mon maquillage.Je mettrai même une culotte.

translation.en: Here you go. Pick any color you like.
translation.fr: Choisis la couleur que tu veux.

translation.en: What am I saying? They're all white.
[Massimo] Let's run away from all this mess. ♪ Am I a fool that I miss you ♪
You have one hour.
Then… I'll do whatever I want with you.
translation.fr: Puis je ferai de toi ce que je veux.

translation.en: No. I'll do whatever I want with you.
translation.fr: Non, c'est moi qui ferai de toice que je veux.

translation.en: Sit down.
I don't wanna hurt you.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas te faire mal.

translation.en: And now… I want you to fuck me the way I like.
translation.fr: Maintenant, je veuxque tu me baises comme j'aime.

translation.en: You think this flower will help make me forget that yesterday
translation.fr: Tu crois que cette fleur me fera oublier

translation.en: you preferred the company of your Mafia fellows over mine?
translation.fr: qu'hier, tu préférais la compagniede tes potes de la mafia à la mienne ?

translation.en: Nope.
[Domenico] But it makes you smile.
How do I look like?
Like the first time, baby.
[Laura] It will be a perfect honeymoon, husband.
translation.fr: Ce sera une lune de miel parfaite,cher mari.

translation.en: [Olga, in Polish] Shit.
[in Italian] Shit.
[Olga, in Polish] You changed your hair!
translation.fr: Putain ! Tu as changé de coiffure.

translation.en: [in English] Welcome home!
[in Polish] Nice to see you too. I didn't know we had to bring food.
translation.fr: Ravie de te voir aussi. On était censés apporter notre bouffe ?

translation.en: I'm living my best life. I fell in love.
translation.fr: Je vis à fond. Je suis tombée amoureuse.

translation.en: And when exactly did that happen?
You're the last person who should be criticizing me.
translation.fr: Tu es mal placée pour me critiquer.

translation.en: I'm wondering how many pieces of furniture I'll need to replace.
Would you be so kind as to make a list of everything that's been tainted?
translation.fr: Fais une liste de tous ceuxqui ont été souillés.

translation.en: Want a raspberry? In Italian, it's called "lampone."
[Laura] You can stick your lampone up your ass.
translation.fr: Tu sais où tu peux te mettre ta lampone ?

translation.en: [in English] I would like to propose you two catch up in a different location
translation.fr: Mesdames, je vous inviteà aller papoter ailleurs.

translation.en: 'cause Domenico, now he needs to focus on work.
Of course, when he's wearing a normal suit and not…
translation.fr: Enfin, quand il sera en costume et pas…

translation.en: What is that, a… a cake or something?
[in Italian] Cream.
[in English] Um, I arranged a little trip for you two.
translation.fr: Je vous ai organisé une virée.

translation.en: Do I look like furniture that you can move around?
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas un meuble qu'on déplace.

translation.en: -I want you to have fun with your friend. -Oh, really?
translation.fr: - Je veux que tu t'amuses avec ton amie.- Ah oui ?

translation.en: -It's not a joke. -[Laura] Why don't you put a leash on me?
translation.fr: - Ce n'est pas une blague.- Mets-moi donc en laisse.

translation.en: Oh, I can see honeymoon is over.
translation.fr: La lune de miel est terminée.

translation.en: [in Polish] Shut up.
Calm down. We could use a vacation.
translation.fr: Du calme. On a besoin de vacances.

translation.en: It's been so long, I've forgotten what alcohol looks like.
translation.fr: J'ai oublié à quoi ressemble l'alcool.

translation.en: -[in Italian] I'll be in the office. -All right.
[in Polish] What's on your mind?
Nothing. I'm just enjoying being here.
translation.fr: C'est simple. Je me sens bien ici.

translation.en: -Is that why you're acting so serious? -[Laura] I'm not.
translation.fr: - Pourtant, tu es bien sérieuse.- Pas du tout.

translation.en: I just feel bad about Massimo.
translation.fr: J'ai des remords. Il s'agit de Massimo.

translation.en: He's making a real effort. He arranged this trip.
translation.fr: Il fait des efforts,nous a organisé ce voyage.

translation.en: Sometimes I think I'm just like my mom.
translation.fr: J'ai l'impression d'agir comme ma mère.

translation.en: Nope. Even worse. You're a typical wife.
translation.fr: Pire encore. Tu agis comme une épouse.

translation.en: Thanks, Olga. I can always count on you.
translation.fr: Merci. Je peux toujours compter sur toi.

translation.en: No worries. Happy to help.
translation.fr: Pas de souci. À ton service.

translation.en: Listen. It's simple, really.
You know what Massimo likes, so just do that.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce qu'aime Massimo,tu sais quoi faire.

translation.en: Oh shit!
I've got an idea.
[in English] It is so late.
I'm sure you can spend a few more minutes with me.
translation.fr: Passe quelques minutes de plus avec moi.

translation.en: I promise you won't regret it.
I know. [sighs]
But it's very late. I have to leave.
translation.fr: Mais il est tard. Je dois partir.

translation.en: [Massimo] We're back to our normal life, baby girl, aren't we?
translation.fr: On est de retour à la vie normale,ma jolie.

translation.en: -[woman gasps] -[man] You're beautiful.
[Laura, in Polish] Holy shit.
-[in Italian] Shit. -[in Polish] Knock first.
-Get dressed. We're leaving. -[Olga] Domenico isn't going anywhere.
translation.fr: - On frappe !- Habille-toi, on y va. Domenico n'ira nulle part.

translation.en: I'll be back in 30 minutes.
Be ready by then, okay?
At least be dressed.
Or just be out from under him!
-[in English] We need to finish. -[both moaning]
[in Polish] Watch out. Careful! Wait.
You're filthy rich, and we still have to run on the grass!
translation.fr: Tu es richeet on doit courir sur l'herbe !

translation.en: -[in English] Ooh! Hi, George! -[both giggling]
[in Polish] Hey, let me drive this time.
-[sighs] We're here. -Come on.
-Just who will be paying for the damage? -What?
I drive around Włochy in Warsaw. If I can do it there, I can do it here.
translation.fr: Je conduis dans Włochy à Varsovie.Je me débrouillerai ici.

translation.en: Hop in.
Okay.
[in English] Move out.
-[in Polish] No. Want me to sit and wave? -Scoot over. Come on.
translation.fr: Non. Tu veux que je fasse coucou ?

translation.en: Okay. I'll sit and wave.
I like it. Just look at me, sitting and waving.
[in Italian] Bye!
[in Polish] Let's go.
[in Polish] Remember how we met? No.
translation.fr: - Tu te rappelles notre rencontre ?- Non.

translation.en: Remember your mom hanging out the window with a plate in her hand?
translation.fr: Ta mère qui traînait à la fenêtre,une assiette à la main.

translation.en: [both, drawn out] Mom!
[Olga] How old were we back then? Six?
translation.fr: On avait quel âge ? Six ans ?

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Even back then, you had powder on your plate.
translation.fr: Tu avais déjàde la poudre dans ton assiette.

translation.en: Hey! It was just powdered Jell-O.
translation.fr: C'était de la gelée en poudre !

translation.en: We ate it with our fingers and went roller-skating. Remember?
translation.fr: On la mangeait avec les doigtset on allait faire du patin.

translation.en: Honestly? I prefer life now, 20 years later.
translation.fr: Je préfère aujourd'hui, 20 ans plus tard.

translation.en: My skates weren't as fast as the Ferrari. Not for lack of trying.
translation.fr: Mes patins n'étaient pas aussi rapidesque la Ferrari, malgré mes efforts.

translation.en: You know what?
What?
It doesn't matter what we drive or what we eat,
translation.fr: Peu importece qu'on conduit ou ce qu'on mange,

translation.en: as long as we're together.
Forever.
With you, I don't even mind having to walk everywhere.
translation.fr: Avec toi, je peux même marcher partout.

translation.en: [Olga] Love you.
I love you too.
-[in Italian] How is everything? -Great.
translation.fr: Tout va bien ? - Oui, merci.- Bien, merci.

translation.en: Great, thanks.
[in Polish] I've missed this.
translation.fr: Ça m'a manqué, de sortir comme ça.

translation.en: [Laura] Lately, everything's gone sideways. Yep.
translation.fr: - Tout dérape en ce moment.- C'est clair.

translation.en: Oh shit.
[in Polish] I guess we're not having dessert.
[in English] We're leaving.
[in Polish] Did you hear that?
translation.fr: On s'en va. Tu as entendu ?

translation.en: [in English] I said… we're leaving.
I have needs.
I know that our beginnings were quite rough,
translation.fr: Je sais que nos débuts ont été difficiles,

translation.en: or more like sick.
You've kidnapped me, and this is sick.
translation.fr: Tu m'as kidnappée, et c'est dingue.

translation.en: But I fell in love with you, and we are together because I decided.
translation.fr: Je suis tombée amoureuse de toiet on est ensemble parce que je l'ai décidé.

translation.en: You cannot control people, and I won't let you control me.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux contrôler ni moi ni personne.

translation.en: -I'm your wife, not one of your soldiers. -What are you talking about?
translation.fr: - Je suis ta femme, pas un de tes soldats.- De quoi tu parles ?

translation.en: -I just want to protect you. -[Laura] This is not protection.
translation.fr: Je veux te protéger. Tu ne me protèges pas.

translation.en: This is prison.
I can't live without doing anything.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas vivre sans rien faire.

translation.en: I miss challenges.
[Massimo] You're right, my girl. I screwed this up. ♪ You were in love with me ♪
translation.fr: Tu as raison, ma puce. J'ai foiré.

translation.en: [echoing] Excuse me.
Mrs. Torricelli, right?
I didn't want to disturb you.
translation.fr: Je ne voulais pas vous déranger.

translation.en: -[song fades] -Mrs. Torricelli, right?
I'm the new gardener, Nacho.
translation.fr: Je suis le nouveau jardinier, Nacho.

translation.en: [Laura] Nacho?
Nacho. Nice to meet you.
You have a nice cap.
[chuckles] Yes, I know. Thank you.
[Laura] But Nacho? It doesn't sound very Italian.
It's a nickname.
My family has Spanish roots.
And you? Where are you from?
Poland.
Thirsty?
How long have you been working for my husband?
[Nacho] I just started.
Mr. Torricelli wants some changes in the garden.
translation.fr: M. Torricelli veutdes changements dans le jardin.

translation.en: I have to work.
I wouldn't like to waste your precious time.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pasvous faire perdre votre temps.

translation.en: Wasting my time?
You're talking to a person who has absolutely nothing to do.
translation.fr: Vous parlez à quelqu'unqui n'a absolument rien à faire.

translation.en: Now my only job is being a… wife.
translation.fr: Ma seule mission, c'est d'être… une épouse.

translation.en: How pathetic is that?
You're wrong, missus.
Being a good wife is one of the most difficult jobs in the world.
translation.fr: Être une bonne épouse est très difficile.

translation.en: [scoffs] It's why I'm so perfect at it.
'Cause I don't have to do anything.
translation.fr: Car je n'ai rien à faire.

translation.en: They cook for me. They clean for me. Even they cut flowers for me.
translation.fr: On cuisine, nettoie pour moi.On coupe même les fleurs pour moi.

translation.en: It's why I'm so perfect at doing nothing.
translation.fr: Je suis parfaite pour ne rien faire.

translation.en: You are a real busy bee.
That's a great talent.
To be perfect without doing anything.
[chuckles] Please don't tell me that you also make money by doing nothing.
translation.fr: Vous faites aussi de l'argentà ne rien faire ?

translation.en: Where do you think it all comes from?
translation.fr: D'où vient tout ça, selon vous ?

translation.en: You need to teach me that.
[woman] Mrs. Torricelli!
I must go. Thank you for the water.
translation.fr: Je dois y aller. Merci pour l'eau.

translation.en: Ah. I will cut some flowers for you.
translation.fr: Je vais vous couper des fleurs.

translation.en: It was a pleasure, Laura from Poland.
translation.fr: Ce fut un plaisir, Laura de Pologne.

translation.en: It was a pleasure, Nacho the gardener.
translation.fr: Ce fut un plaisir, Nacho le jardinier.

translation.en: So, let's see what's inside.
translation.fr: Voyons ce qu'il y a dedans.

translation.en: Congrats.
You are the owner of your own clothing company.
translation.fr: Tu es propriétairede ton entreprise de vêtements.

translation.en: So, I know that you love work,
translation.fr: Je sais que tu aimes le travail

translation.en: and I want you to be free to do what you love.
translation.fr: et je veux que tu sois librede faire ce que tu aimes.

translation.en: And I know that you love fashion.
-♪ All I want is you ♪ -[mouthing] I love you.
[Laura] It's hard to get a present for someone who has everything.
translation.fr: C'est dur de faire un cadeauà quelqu'un qui a tout.

translation.en: But I will give you something I think you should like.
translation.fr: Mais je vais t'offrir quelque chosequi devrait te plaire.

translation.en: Open it…
if you're brave enough.
translation.fr: Si tu en as le courage.

translation.en: Is this a fucking summer-edition proposal?
translation.fr: C'est une demande en mariage,édition d'été ?

translation.en: Or it's real?
[chuckles] Pumpkin.
[in Italian] Will you marry me?
-Yes. [chuckles] -Yes?
[in English] Baby.
I don't want to sound impatient, but…
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas avoir l'air impatient,mais…

translation.en: I think that Santa has forgotten me.
translation.fr: je crois que le père Noël m'a oublié.

translation.en: Santa is coming.
He will let you know where is the present.
translation.fr: Il te dira quel est le cadeau.

translation.en: What?
Be patient.
I think I've seen this before.
Now the only thing that's missing is the lion.
translation.fr: Tout ce qui manque, c'est le lion.

translation.en: This is your present, Don Massimo.
I trust you.
I want to give you everything you wanna take.
translation.fr: Je veux te donnertout ce que tu veux prendre.

translation.en: Everything is there.
♪ Don't get me wrong ♪
♪ But I don't like promises ♪
Thank you for arranging the arrival of my parents.
translation.fr: Merci d'avoir organisél'arrivée de mes parents.

translation.en: It was a wonderful gift.
[softly] Anything for you.
Don't you miss your family?
translation.fr: Ta famille ne te manque pas ?

translation.en: Because, besides Domenico, you have nobody.
translation.fr: À part Domenico, tu n'as personne.

translation.en: You had Mario.
It was Mario's own decision to retire.
translation.fr: Mario a décidé de prendre sa retraite.

translation.en: I didn't make him do it.
He couldn't deal with…
After the accident, he was blaming himself for what happened,
translation.fr: Après l'accident, il s'en est voulu.

translation.en: but I know that he couldn't do anything.
translation.fr: Je sais qu'il n'y pouvait rien.

translation.en: But… he's a man of honor.
And I've lost my right hand.
I know how important he was in your life.
translation.fr: Je sais à quel pointil comptait dans ta vie.

translation.en: Sometimes I think that, uh,
you feel so lonely…
translation.fr: que tu te sens très seul,

translation.en: 'cause besides me, you have no one.
translation.fr: car à part moi, tu n'as personne.

translation.en: No parents, no siblings.
translation.fr: Ni parents ni frères et sœurs.

translation.en: I have a brother.
But I'd rather not have him.
But… correct me if I'm wrong…
Do we still have something to try out?
translation.fr: on a encore quelque chose à essayer.

translation.en: You have a brother? And you didn't tell me about this before?
translation.fr: Tu as un frère ?Et tu ne m'en as jamais parlé ?

translation.en: I still have some work to do.
No, do not tell me that you're about to leave.
translation.fr: Non, ne me dis pas que tu t'en vas.

translation.en: -Massimo! -[door opens]
[Olga, in Polish] This is one hell of a present.
[Emily, in English] Hello, ladies. I am Emily.
-Hello. -I'm glad you're here.
-[both kiss twice] -Thank you so much.
I'm Laura, and this is my best friend, Olga.
translation.fr: Laura, et voici ma meilleure amie, Olga.

translation.en: [in Italian] Hello!
[Emily, in English] Hi.
[in Italian] Let's go.
[in Polish] Luxury is my middle name.
-[in English] Do you like it? -[gasps] Amazing.
If I understand correctly, we have to talk about business
translation.fr: Si je comprends bien,on doit parler affaires

translation.en: after the New Year.
And today we have to make you look like superstars. Is that right?
translation.fr: Aujourd'hui, on doit vous donnerun look de superstars.

translation.en: Sure, sure. But remember, I'm the hot goddess.
translation.fr: Oui, mais souviens-toi,je suis une déesse torride.

translation.en: You get used to her.
Or not.
[in Italian] Mia, can we begin?
[Mia] Of course.
Come on in.
[in Polish] Laura, what's going on?
-Nothing. -What do you mean? Something's wrong.
translation.fr: - Rien.- Comment ça ? Il y a un problème.

translation.en: -I don't want to talk about it. -Do I have to force it out of you?
translation.fr: - Je ne veux pas en parler.- Tu veux que je te force ?

translation.en: I'm pissed off at Massimo.
But I'm not discussing it with him or with you.
translation.fr: Mais je n'en parlerai pas.Ni avec lui ni avec toi.

translation.en: I get it. I respect your decision. Booze would help.
translation.fr: Pigé, je le respecte.Je recommande l'alcool.

translation.en: [in English] It's enough for me. I want to go back.
translation.fr: Ça me suffit. Je veux rentrer.

translation.en: [in Italian] Excuse me.
[in English] Can't you see I'm in the middle of a conversation?
Yeah. You're so gentle, talking to him,
translation.fr: Tu es si doux et tu lui parles.

translation.en: but talking to me, it's a different situation, right?
translation.fr: Mais me parler à moi, c'est autre chose.

translation.en: I have one more last conversation.
Right.
I'll do my best to be quick.
All conversations are more important than one with me.
translation.fr: Toutes les conversationscomptent plus que les nôtres.

translation.en: [Massimo, in Italian] Excuse me.
[in Polish] Thanks for inviting us. I haven't had this much fun in ages.
translation.fr: Je me suis rarement autant amusée.

translation.en: Mom, I'm not sure I can say the same about Dad.
translation.fr: Maman, j'ignore si papa est d'accord.

translation.en: If the love of my life is having fun, so am I.
translation.fr: Si l'amour de ma vie s'amuse,alors moi aussi.

translation.en: [Laura] You know what?
You've been married for 30 years,
and I wish Massimo looked at me the same way Dad looks at you.
translation.fr: je voudrais que Massimo me regardecomme papa te regarde.

translation.en: Sweetie, you need to understand that marriage is about compromise.
translation.fr: Le mariage,c'est une histoire de compromis.

translation.en: Don't you agree, honey?
I wouldn't dare think otherwise.
translation.fr: Je n'oserais pas penser le contraire.

translation.en: And now… let's dance. Just you and me.
translation.fr: Et maintenant, dansons. Juste toi et moi.

translation.en: [Nacho, in English] Laura?
Do you feel okay?
Get me out from here.
[Laura] Can you stop the car, please?
[quietly] My God.
How could he be so stupid? And with her?
translation.fr: Comment a-t-il pu être aussi stupide,et avec elle ?

translation.en: I wish I could go away from here and never come back.
translation.fr: Je voudrais partir et ne jamais revenir.

translation.en: I'm flying home in a few hours.
translation.fr: Je repars chez moi tout à l'heure.

translation.en: We will find a ticket…
if you want to sort things out… away from here.
translation.fr: Si vous voulez arranger les choses,je vous attendrai.

translation.en: Wait for a second.
[in Polish] Mom, I'm sorry. You were right.
translation.fr: Maman, je suis désolée. Tu avais raison.

translation.en: I was wrong about Massimo.
translation.fr: Je me suis trompée sur Massimo.

translation.en: After what I saw, I don't want to see him ever again. Obviously.
translation.fr: Après ce que j'ai vu,je ne veux plus le revoir.

translation.en: I need to get away for a while and collect my thoughts.
translation.fr: Je dois partir un moment,reprendre mes esprits.

translation.en: Don't worry about me. I'm safe.
translation.fr: Ne t'inquiète pas. Je suis en sécurité.

translation.en: I love you. I'll call in a few days.
translation.fr: Je t'aime.Je t'appelle dans quelques jours.

translation.en: [in English] Take me anywhere, but take me away from here.
translation.fr: Emmène-moi n'importe où, mais emmène-moi loin d'ici.

translation.en: Wow, you look great.
I like you in this outfit.
I took what I found in the closet.
translation.fr: J'ai pris ce que j'ai trouvé.

translation.en: Maybe it's your girlfriend's?
I think she prefers a sporty style.
Sister's. I don't have a girlfriend, Laura.
translation.fr: À ma sœur. Je n'ai pas de copine.

translation.en: These are my sister's clothes.
translation.fr: Ce sont les vêtements de ma sœur.

translation.en: Come.
Dinner is ready.
Look what I made for you. My favorite dish.
translation.fr: Regarde ce que je t'ai préparé.Mon plat préféré.

translation.en: -Paella. -But dinner?
Did I sleep so long?
It's so nice here.
It's my father's house.
translation.fr: C'est la maison de mon père.

translation.en: Anyway, my sister Amelia will come by later.
translation.fr: Bref.Ma sœur Amelia va passer tout à l'heure.

translation.en: I think you will like each other.
She's a cool girl.
She's a bit moody.
You know, pregnancy hormones.
translation.fr: Tu sais, les hormones de grossesse.

translation.en: Your sister is pregnant. I'm sorry.
Are you okay?
It's just a pity she chose an asshole for the father.
translation.fr: Dommage que le père soit un connard.

translation.en: Wait a moment.
I have to clean.
[Klara, in Polish] I'm gonna kill him! Excuse me. Leave me alone!
translation.fr: Je vais le tuer ! Laissez-moi tranquille !

translation.en: [in Italian] Let her through.
[in English] I have no idea where she--
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas où elle est…

translation.en: What did you do to her? What did you do to my daughter?
translation.fr: Que lui avez-vous fait ?Qu'avez-vous fait à ma fille ?

translation.en: She recorded a message saying she was leaving you.
translation.fr: Elle m'a laissé un messagedisant qu'elle vous quittait.

translation.en: She never wants to see you again.
translation.fr: Elle ne veut plus vous voir.

translation.en: I knew you were a bad person since I met you.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours su que vous étiezune mauvaise graine.

translation.en: I don't know what you did to her, but I know one thing.
translation.fr: J'ignore ce que vous lui avez fait,mais je sais une chose.

translation.en: If my daughter decided to leave you,
translation.fr: Si ma fille a décidé de vous quitter,

translation.en: she has a damn good reason for it!
We are going back to Poland.
We'll wait for her to come home.
translation.fr: On va attendre qu'elle rentre à la maison.

translation.en: My husband is already in the car.
translation.fr: Mon mari est déjà dans la voiture.

translation.en: Don't try to stop me.
[in Italian] Bring me Davide and Tommaso. Now.
Go!
[in English] Ignacio has been so sweet since I'm pregnant.
translation.fr: Ignacio est adorabledepuis que je suis enceinte.

translation.en: I'm treated like a queen.
translation.fr: Il me traite comme une reine.

translation.en: How do you know that Nacho doesn't like him?
translation.fr: Comment sais-tu que Nacho ne l'aime pas ?

translation.en: Because he's Sicilian.
I used to like Sicilians.
You used to love the Sicilians.
That's even worse.
I can see that your brother takes care a lot about you.
translation.fr: Je vois que ton frère prend soin de toi.

translation.en: Yeah, Nacho is wonderful. The best.
Just don't tell him I said that. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Ne lui dis pas que j'ai dit ça.

translation.en: [sighs] I would like to see him finally settle down with some nice girl.
translation.fr: J'aimerais qu'il se pose enfinavec une fille bien.

translation.en: Like you. He deserves it.
How do you know I'm nice? You just met me.
translation.fr: Comment sais-tu que je suis bien ?

translation.en: Intuition. It never disappoints me.
translation.fr: Mon instinct ne se trompe jamais.

translation.en: And there is something between you two, I hope.
translation.fr: Il y a quelque chose entre vous deux,j'espère.

translation.en: Oh, really?
But you know, my life got complicated, so right now, I have to fix it.
translation.fr: Ma vie est compliquée,j'ai des trucs à gérer.

translation.en: Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that.
And you know that Nacho worked for me as a gardener?
translation.fr: Tu sais que Nacho a été mon jardinier ?

translation.en: [Amelia] As a gardener?
Oh my God, my brother will never cease to amaze me.
translation.fr: Il ne cessera jamais de me surprendre.

translation.en: So, you didn't know what he was doing in Sicily? [Amelia] Honey, you can't keep up with Nacho.
translation.fr: - Tu ignorais ce qu'il faisait en Sicile ?- Nacho est dur à suivre.

translation.en: He's the most spontaneous person I know, and he's also very loyal to his family.
translation.fr: Il est super spontanéet toujours loyal envers sa famille.

translation.en: Maybe too loyal sometimes.
-[Nacho grunts] -Nacho!
-I did my hair and makeup. Come on. -[softly] Sorry.
translation.fr: Je me suis coiffée et maquillée !

translation.en: I forgive you.
-Thank you. -You're welcome.
[in Italian] A Sicilian man can only be understood
translation.fr: Un Sicilien ne peut être compris

translation.en: by a woman born and raised in Sicily.
translation.fr: que par une femme née et élevée en Sicile.

translation.en: You can't expect a woman who's been living a normal life in Poland
translation.fr: Tu ne peux t'attendre à ce qu'une femme qui a vécu une vie normale en Pologne

translation.en: to be able to handle life with…
…an extraordinary man such as yourself.
translation.fr: avec un hommeaussi extraordinaire que toi.

translation.en: Let's put all that behind us.
Let's join forces and unite our families.
translation.fr: Unissons nos forceset celles de nos familles.

translation.en: We will be indestructible.
Thanks for coming.
translation.fr: Merci d'être venue à une heure pareille.

translation.en: I had my doubts, but now I'm sure.
translation.fr: J'avais des doutes,mais maintenant, je sais.

translation.en: Laura didn't leave on her own.
You were involved.
I'll find out what happened,
and you'll get what you deserve.
translation.fr: Tu auras ce que tu mérites.

translation.en: You're so good at it.
[clicks tongue] I'm not sure if it was a compliment
or you just cut my balls.
translation.fr: ou si tu viens de m'émasculer.

translation.en: Anyway,
thank you.
[softly] I miss him.
I know.
But tell me one thing.
Why always good girls fall in love with bad guys?
translation.fr: Pourquoi les filles bien tombentamoureuses des mauvais garçons ?

translation.en: How do you know I'm good?
translation.fr: Comment sais-tu que je suis bien ?

translation.en: Maybe something's wrong with me because he cheated on me.
translation.fr: Et s'il m'a trompée par ma faute ?

translation.en: Laura…
don't you ever say that again.
It's not your fault.
A guy cheating on a woman like you must be an idiot.
translation.fr: Un mec qui trompe une femme comme toidoit être un idiot.

translation.en: Without balls.
-Do you understand? -[both chuckle]
You understand.
Good.
We can watch the movie now.
And drink.
Smile.
[Laura] Thank you for letting me stay here.
[softly] You're welcome.
[in Italian] I told you it wasn't going to work and that he'd figure it out.
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit que ça ne marcherait pas,qu'il comprendrait tout.

translation.en: You should have done a better job. I played my part perfectly.
translation.fr: Tu aurais dû mieux jouer la comédie.J'ai bien joué mon rôle.

translation.en: [sighs] It's not like it was difficult!
She doesn't even know Massimo has a twin brother.
translation.fr: Elle ne sait pasque Massimo a un frère jumeau.

translation.en: [sighs] I should have listened to my intuition.
-[knocking on door] -Come in.
What do you want?
I have a message.
Spit it out. I don't have all day. She's not in Sicily.
translation.fr: - Vas-y, accouche.- Elle n'est pas en Sicile.

translation.en: -What did you say? -How come?
translation.fr: - Quoi ?- Pourquoi elle n'est pas en Sicile ?

translation.en: [man] She left with him. Please, don't.
translation.fr: - Elle est partie avec lui.- Ne fais pas ça.

translation.en: [spluttering] I'm just--
You're just a clown.
You just screwed up our plan.
Everything was ready. All you had to do was pick her up.
translation.fr: Tout était prêt.Tu n'avais qu'à aller la chercher.

translation.en: Will you take care of him…
…or should I do it?
Okay, calm down. Relax.
Have a seat on the couch, okay?
I will take care of it. Come on, now. Easy. Come on.
Relax. It's all right.
Hey. Don't worry, okay?
Have somebody clean up this mess.
Fuck. My pants.
They're new.
[Domenico] Hello?
Yes. Okay.
Thank you.
We got confirmation.
He's on the island with him.
translation.fr: Il est sur l'île avec lui.

translation.en: Everything is ready.
He's waiting for the green light.
[Massimo] I know what to do in this kind of situation.
translation.fr: Je sais quoi fairedans ce genre de situation.

translation.en: We can't be compared to this scum.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas être comparésà cette merde.

translation.en: You know you can only rely on--
[in Italian] …on yourself.
[in English] I'm here too, if you haven't noticed.
And if you are talking about Laura, I want to know everything, you understand?
translation.fr: Si vous parlez de Laura,je veux tout savoir, compris ?

translation.en: Pumpkin, we're trying to do business--
translation.fr: Ma puce, on essaye de bosser.

translation.en: [in Polish] Don't "pumpkin" me!
[in English] Laura is fucking gone, and you're talking about business?
translation.fr: Laura a disparu et vous parlez boulot ?

translation.en: [in Polish] No fucking way!
[in English] Baby, please calm down.
I can't calm down. I'm Polish.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas. Je suis polonaise.

translation.en: [in Polish] Dammit.
[in Italian] Wait. Wait.
Sit down.
[softly, in English] Make love with me.
You killed him?
Unfortunately not. He will be fine.
For now.
Are you okay?
[Laura] What happened last night?
Don't think about it.
You are safe here.
Tell me.
[Nacho] Someone broke in.
It's over now. The police will take care of it.
translation.fr: C'est fini. La police va s'en occuper.

translation.en: But… why would anyone break into your house?
And why can an ordinary gardener like you have all of this?
translation.fr: Et comment un jardinier ordinairecomme toi peut avoir tout ça ?

translation.en: What a luxury life.
I told you.
My father is a wealthy man.
I'm trying to become independent of him.
Enjoy.
Sorry, 'cause you helped me in a very difficult moment in my life,
translation.fr: Désolée. Tu m'as aidéeà un moment difficile de ma vie

translation.en: and right now, I take it out on you.
translation.fr: Désolée. Tu m'as aidéeà un moment difficile de ma vie et je m'en prends à toi.

translation.en: [Nacho] I deserve it.
[Laura] You do not deserve it.
Sometimes I act so irrational.
I'm sorry.
it's fine.
Now, let's eat. We have plans for today.
translation.fr: Mangeons.On a des projets pour aujourd'hui.

translation.en: I do appreciate your good spirit, but, you know, because of last night,
translation.fr: J'adore ta bonne humeur,mais à cause d'hier soir,

translation.en: I don't have a good mood to do anything special.
translation.fr: je ne suis pas dans le bon état d'esprit.

translation.en: [Nacho] You're right.
It would be better if we stay at home and get upset about last night.
translation.fr: Restons à la maisonet soyons contrariés pour hier soir.

translation.en: So, where do you want to get upset?
In the dining room?
Or the dancing hall?
Or…
let me take you to a place where you can smile.
translation.fr: laisse-moi t'emmenerlà où tu pourras sourire.

translation.en: I promise if you don't smile there, we will come back here and weep together.
translation.fr: Si tu n'y souris pas,on reviendra ici et on pleurera ensemble.

translation.en: Eat, please.
I think this car is so cool.
It's cooler than your husband's spaceship, huh?
translation.fr: Plus que la navette spatiale de ton mari ?

translation.en: Corvette, 1992. The best year.
[Laura] Like wine?
I like this model.
[in Italian] Turn on the air conditioning.
translation.fr: Mets la clim, s'il te plaît.

translation.en: Hello?
What?
Of course. Thanks.
What?
They weren't able to find her.
translation.fr: Ils n'ont pas réussi à l'intercepter.

translation.en: He survived.
Can you go any faster? Hurry up.
[Nacho, in English] Like it?
Yeah.
[Laura] I can say this one is, um, different than I used to drink.
translation.fr: C'est très différentde ce que je buvais avant.

translation.en: Or maybe this one guy's just different from the ones you had before.
translation.fr: Peut-être que ce mec est différentde ceux que tu as connus avant.

translation.en: It's so beautiful here, yeah?
[Nacho] We can only come here by sea.
translation.fr: On n'y vient que par la mer.

translation.en: So, that's the perfect place for a date because you know you can't run away.
translation.fr: Le lieu parfait pour un rancard,on ne peut pas s'échapper.

translation.en: Success is guaranteed.
[Nacho] Yeah. That's true.
I usually come here with all my girlfriends.
translation.fr: Je viens ici avec toutes mes copines.

translation.en: From Poland.
Any of those Polish girlfriends ever escape from you?
translation.fr: Une de ces copines polonaisest'a déjà échappé ?

translation.en: Never.
[Laura] Hold my beer.
[Nacho] I will leave you with my sister for a moment.
translation.fr: Je te laisse avec ma sœur un moment.

translation.en: I need to take care of one thing.
[Amelia] Hi, guys.
Wow, you look so gorgeous in that dress.
translation.fr: Tu es magnifique dans cette robe.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Ladies.
I can see you won't be missing me too much.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas vous manquer, on dirait.

translation.en: But I hope you will miss me a little bit.
translation.fr: Mais j'espèreque je vous manquerai un peu.

translation.en: Let's sit.
How are you?
I'm going for a swim.
What's wrong?
I will teach you something.
[Laura] What?
Surfing without waves.
[screams] I don't have an outfit! Stop!
No! [squeals]
Now it doesn't matter.
[in Italian] Massimo. Excuse me.
What is it?
Call Tommaso. We have to go. Get everything ready.
translation.fr: Appelle Tommaso.On doit partir. Prépare tout.

translation.en: [Nacho, in English] Are you having a nightmare
or just an erotic dream?
Nobody taught you that gentlemen
translation.fr: Personne ne t'a appris qu'un gentleman

translation.en: do not come to a woman's bedroom uninvited?
translation.fr: n'entre pas dans la chambre d'une femmesans être invité ?

translation.en: Technically speaking, this is my bedroom
that I'm sharing with you
so you don't have to sleep on the beach.
translation.fr: pour que tu ne dormes pas sur la plage.

translation.en: You must admit
that I am a real gentleman.
translation.fr: que je suis un vrai gentleman.

translation.en: Anyway, I just came to tell you that food is ready.
translation.fr: Bref, je suis venu te direque le repas est prêt.

translation.en: Was it… a nightmare or just an erotic dream?
translation.fr: Était-ce un cauchemarou juste un rêve érotique ?

translation.en: -It was sex. -[Nacho] With whom?
With you.
And did you like it to be?
It was pretty good, but in my entire life, I had better.
translation.fr: C'était pas mal,mais de toute ma vie, j'ai fait mieux.

translation.en: This is my asylum.
One day, I would like to leave here for good with someone like you.
translation.fr: Un jour, je voudrais partir pour de bon,avec quelqu'un comme toi.

translation.en: But for now, you're stuck here with me, so… I'm not going anywhere… yet.
translation.fr: Mais tu es coincé ici avec moi,alors je n'irai encore nulle part.

translation.en: We are going to see my father today.
translation.fr: On va voir mon père aujourd'hui.

translation.en: [Laura] And? That makes you worried, or what?
I've already met your sister, and you're not going to tell him
translation.fr: J'ai déjà rencontré ta sœur et tu ne vas pas lui annoncerqu'on est mariés. Alors ?

translation.en: that we're getting married or something like this. So?
translation.fr: et tu ne vas pas lui annoncerqu'on est mariés. Alors ?

translation.en: Massimo will be there.
[in Spanish] Sir, they're here.
Let them wait.
[in English] Who are you?
And stop telling me bullshit about being a gardener.
translation.fr: Et ne me dis pas que tu es jardinier.

translation.en: This is the only moment that you can tell me the truth.
translation.fr: C'est ta seule chancede me dire la vérité.

translation.en: I am Marcelo "Nacho" Matos,
son of Don Fernando Matos,
the head of the local Mafia
translation.fr: le chef de la mafia locale

translation.en: and eternal rival of your husband's family.
translation.fr: et grand rival de la famille de ton mari.

translation.en: So, your father told you to bring me to the island?
translation.fr: Ton père t'a dit de m'amener ici ?

translation.en: No. You came here because you wanted to. What if I didn't want to?
translation.fr: - Non, tu es venue, car tu le voulais.- Et si je n'avais pas voulu ?

translation.en: I would've found a way.
[Laura] Fuck.
I was so naive.
I thought that you were my real friend
translation.fr: Je pensais que tu étais un ami.

translation.en: and nothing was a coincidence.
Laura, I wasn't faking my feelings for you.
translation.fr: Laura, je ne simulais pasmes sentiments pour toi.

translation.en: So I guess I have to thank you.
'Cause you proved that men aren't good. Only good at lying.
translation.fr: Tu as prouvé que tu n'étais pasun mec bien. Juste un menteur.

translation.en: You think I would fake all of this?
translation.fr: Tu crois que j'ai fait semblant ?

translation.en: Take you to the beach?
translation.fr: Je t'ai emmenée à la plage,

translation.en: Teach you to surf?
And the kiss?
You didn't feel it was real?
translation.fr: Tu as dû sentir qu'il était sincère.

translation.en: It was real, like a fairy tale.
And if you think I would fall in love again with a guy who thinks
translation.fr: Si tu crois que je vais retomberamoureuse d'un mec

translation.en: he can have me just like that, you're absolutely wrong.
translation.fr: qui pense pouvoir m'avoir comme ça,détrompe-toi.

translation.en: 'Cause I've learned from my mistakes,
and I've learned that you're a fuckin' liar.
translation.fr: Et j'ai appris que tu étais un menteur.

translation.en: [Nacho] Be rational.
I didn't make you come here.
translation.fr: Je ne t'ai pas forcée à venir.

translation.en: You came with me because you felt safe.
translation.fr: Tu es venue,car tu t'es sentie en sécurité.

translation.en: You ruined everything since the moment you hid the truth from me.
translation.fr: Tu as tout gâché en me cachant la vérité.

translation.en: And I'm done with guys who think that they can do whatever they want.
translation.fr: J'en ai marre des mecsqui se croient tout permis.

translation.en: Take me there.
Let's end with these gangster games.
translation.fr: Finissons-en de ces jeux de gangsters.

translation.en: Fuck. [exhales]
I always dreamed of living in a beach house and opening a surf school.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours rêvé de vivre sur la plageet d'ouvrir une école de surf.

translation.en: I was just unlucky to be born into the wrong family.
translation.fr: Je suis né dans la mauvaise famille.

translation.en: My father had different plans for me.
translation.fr: Mon père avait d'autres projets pour moi.

translation.en: Laura, for God's sake, you are the wife of a Mafia boss.
translation.fr: Laura, tu es la femmed'un chef de la mafia.

translation.en: You know how important the loyalty is for the family.
translation.fr: Tu sais l'importance de la loyautépour la famille.

translation.en: When the Mob boss is your father, you don't have much choice.
translation.fr: En tant que fils du chef de la mafia,on n'a pas le choix.

translation.en: [Laura] No. You always have a choice.
translation.fr: Non. On a toujours le choix.

translation.en: The thing is, you have to take responsibility of your own life.
translation.fr: Il suffit de prendre sa vie en main.

translation.en: [in Spanish] We'll take care of her now.
No. She's coming with me.
Don Matos asked you to come alone.
translation.fr: Don Matos t'a demandé de venir seul.

translation.en: Nobody told me about that.
He already has guests.
[in English] Laura.
What?
-Be careful. -[Laura] Oh, really?
I don't think anything worse than the last few days could happen.
translation.fr: Rien de pire que ces derniers joursne peut arriver.

translation.en: Thank you for accepting the invitation to the meeting.
[Massimo] I didn't really have a choice.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas eu le choix.

translation.en: Oh, I would like to apologize that we are meeting
translation.fr: Mes excuses pour les circonstancesdéplaisantes de cette rencontre,

translation.en: in such unpleasant circumstances, but I believe that, as a businessman,
translation.fr: Mes excuses pour les circonstancesdéplaisantes de cette rencontre, mais en tant qu'homme d'affaires,

translation.en: you will understand that the goal justifies the means.
translation.fr: tu comprendrasque la fin justifie les moyens.

translation.en: After all, the stakes are high.
translation.fr: Après tout, les enjeux sont élevés.

translation.en: Our family had the non-aggression pact.
translation.fr: Notre famille avaitun pacte de non-agression.

translation.en: You violated it.
Oh, your father and I, we were both men of honor.
translation.fr: Ton père et moiétions des hommes d'honneur.

translation.en: As long as he was alive,
we both respected the borders of our interests.
translation.fr: on a respecté les limites de nos intérêts.

translation.en: [takes a deep breath] But you, Massimo,
you're expanding too much.
Some people don't like it.
Some people?
Some people, who?
You?
[Fernando] We have been sending you warnings.
Laura's accident.
But you were too convinced of your own strength.
translation.fr: Mais tu es trop convaincude ta propre force.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Your father was wise.
He knew that no opponent should be taken lightly.
translation.fr: Il ne prenait aucun adversaireà la légère.

translation.en: I cannot bear…
more chances with you as a boss.
translation.fr: plus de risques avec toi comme boss.

translation.en: All the families would benefit from someone more, uh,
translation.fr: Toutes les familles gagneraientà avoir quelqu'un

translation.en: controllable to be in your place.
translation.fr: de plus contrôlable à ta place.

translation.en: We figured your stupid brother will do perfect.
translation.fr: On s'est dit que ton idiotde frère ferait l'affaire.

translation.en: He's so blinded with revenge and greed
translation.fr: Aveuglé par la vengeance et la cupidité,

translation.en: that he doesn't care much for the family business.
translation.fr: il se fiche de l'affaire familiale.

translation.en: You're wrong.
You're wrong… if you think I'm gonna put my father's empire
translation.fr: si vous pensez que je vais mettrel'empire de mon père

translation.en: into the hands of a dog.
Sit down. Massimo--
[panting] A traitor who put my dad into the hands of Death!
translation.fr: Un traître qui a poussé mon pèredans les griffes de la mort !

translation.en: You're fucking wrong!
Let me remind you that your wife is still with us.
translation.fr: Je te rappelleque ta femme est toujours avec nous.

translation.en: You call yourself a man of honor?
translation.fr: Vous dites être un homme d'honneur ?

translation.en: And you use my wife this way?
translation.fr: Et vous vous servez de ma femme ?

translation.en: Massimo, coming here with Nacho was Laura's decision.
translation.fr: Massimo, venir ici avec Nachoétait la décision de Laura.

translation.en: Nobody made her do it.
I need to see my wife.
I need to see my wife. Now.
Oh, I can assure you that she's safe.
Marcelo brought her to the island and has been taking care for her.
translation.fr: Marcelo l'a amenée sur l'îleet a pris soin d'elle.

translation.en: Now she's with Miguel, my personal bodyguard.
translation.fr: Elle est avec Miguel, mon garde du corps.

translation.en: [Nacho, in Spanish] Father.
-You said Laura's with Miguel? -[Fernando] Yes.
I wanted to make sure she'd be safe.
translation.fr: Je voulais m'assurer de sa sécurité.

translation.en: Laura left with Enrique and the other bodyguard.
translation.fr: Laura est partie avec Enriqueet l'autre garde du corps.

translation.en: [in English] What?
[in Spanish] Find her.
[in English] We need to go. Now.
translation.fr: Il faut y aller. Tout de suite.

translation.en: [Laura] You were the biggest mistake of my life.
translation.fr: Tu as été la plus grosse erreur de ma vie.

translation.en: How could you?
How could you?
You're not Massimo.
I'm not.
[inhales sharply] I am Adriano Torricelli.
The twin brother who was so unlucky because he was born ten minutes later.
translation.fr: Le frère jumeau malchanceuxné dix minutes plus tard.

translation.en: Ten minutes. Ten minutes.
But it's nice to meet you,
baby girl.
[Laura] Do not call me "baby girl."
-Where is Massimo? -[Adriano] He's not too far.
translation.fr: Où est Massimo ? Il n'est pas loin.

translation.en: Not too far. [inhales sharply]
But I think that you have to wait a little longer.
translation.fr: Mais il faudra attendre encore un peu.

translation.en: He's a busy man.
[clicks tongue] Yeah, I'm happy to spend a lot of time with my new sister-in-law,
translation.fr: Je suis ravi de passer du tempsavec ma nouvelle belle-sœur

translation.en: you know, and have a little chat with her.
translation.fr: et de papoter un peu avec elle.

translation.en: We have nothing to talk about.
translation.fr: On n'a rien à se dire.

translation.en: I disagree.
I'm gonna tell you a story about taking back what's mine.
translation.fr: Je vais te racontercomment je vais récupérer mon dû.

translation.en: I mean, my dad is no longer an obstacle, yeah.
translation.fr: Mon père n'est plus un obstacle.

translation.en: And now…
[spluttering] I have to get rid of your husband.
translation.fr: Je dois me débarrasser de ton mari.

translation.en: Don't worry, Laura. [chuckles]
I won't leave you alone with him.
translation.fr: Je ne te laisserai pas seule avec lui.

translation.en: -[music fades] -[Laura] What are you doing here?
What does it look like I'm doing? [scoffs]
[sighs] I'm winning.
Massimo made a huge mistake
by underestimating the anger of the abandoned woman.
translation.fr: en sous-estimant la colèrede la femme abandonnée.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
You were supposed to wait in Sicily until the negotiations were over.
translation.fr: Vous deviez attendrela fin des négociations en Sicile.

translation.en: You know them?
Honey, we were the ones who pushed you into his arms.
translation.fr: Chérie, c'est nousqui t'avons poussée dans ses bras.

translation.en: [in Italian] Did you really think you could just say the word
translation.fr: Tu croyais vraiment qu'un mot suffirait à me faire disparaître de ta viecomme un chien ?

translation.en: and I'd disappear from your life?
translation.fr: à me faire disparaître de ta viecomme un chien ?

translation.en: That I would've lived off your handouts in exile?
translation.fr: Que j'aurais vécu en exilavec ta charité ?

translation.en: No, Massimo. No.
You finally showed your weakness.
translation.fr: Tu nous as montré ta faiblesse.

translation.en: Question is,
do you really think this little whore's worth the whole empire our father created?
translation.fr: crois-tu vraiment que cette petite putevaille tout l'empire de notre père ?

translation.en: Though I have to say, she's not bad. [kisses]
translation.fr: Mais je dois dire qu'elle n'est pas mal.

translation.en: [in English] Sometimes I wonder
if your child
would've looked more like you…
[smacks lips] …or like her.
It's a pity.
It's a pity that we will never know.
Because of the accident.
